scripts.build: yarn prep:sepolia && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:polygon: yarn prep:polygon && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:mainnet: yarn prep:mainnet && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:base: yarn prep:base && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:base_goerli: yarn prep:base_goerli && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:rinkeby: yarn prep:rinkeby && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:harmony: yarn prep:harmony && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:gnosis: yarn prep:gnosis && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:avalanche: yarn prep:avalanche && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:celo: yarn prep:celo && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:aurora: yarn prep:aurora && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:moonbeam: yarn prep:moonbeam && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:arbitrum: yarn prep:arbitrum && graph codegen && graph build

scripts.build:bnb_chain: yarn prep:bnb_chain && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:sepolia: yarn prep:sepolia && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.test: rm -rf tests/.bin && yarn && yarn prep:goerli && graph test -v 0.5.4
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn build:mainnet && cross-env NETWORK=mainnet node src/scripts/deploy-goldsky.js
scripts.deploy:sepolia: yarn build:sepolia && cross-env NETWORK=sepolia node src/scripts/deploy-goldsky.js
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn prep:goerli && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-goerli
